[#fire-history_feature-type]
====== Feature type

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description:fire-history:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type
|Definition | The value of `tern:featureType` _MUST_ be: http://linked.data.gov.au/def/tern-cv/d4fc54b1-0ad3-4512-86b7-d42b121ece45[`vegetation disturbance`].
|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _vegetation disturbance_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
